channel.title: Matrix 718 loading 742 Cache client help
channel.description:
I know you all probably get this a whole ton, but I added the 742 cache to my source, and I'm looking on wondering how to fix the Nulled Npc's. Is this a client issue? I'm trying to learn all of this, and learn how to fix. Could you possibly post a client (Not the no-regret client, it uses over 90% of my cpu for some reason) that has this fixed? Or if this is what I'm thinking, the OP code issues, pm/post those? I'd really love it if one of you could help me out. Thank you very much
Here is an image:
[img]http://puu.sh/2cKs2[/img]

item.title: Matrix 718 loading 742 Cache client help
item.dc:creator: @codyth codyth
item.description:
@codyth wrote:

Thank’s a bunch Potzon, but one issue Ive had with that client, it uses just about all of my CPU and RAM, whereas all other RSPS clients use arround 30%. How can I fix this?

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix 718 loading 742 Cache client help
item.dc:creator: @NeighFox NeighFox
item.description:
@NeighFox wrote:

tlol:

this maybe sounds very nooby but how do i change my cache (728) to a 734??? :o

If people think they know how to fix your issue they will read YOUR topic. Do not ask an unrelated question in someone else’s topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix 718 loading 742 Cache client help
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

Yes, it’s a client issue. It’s an “opcode error”. Use this client instead, it has got the missing opcodes:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/470968-718-742-client-742-client-opcodes.html

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix 718 loading 742 Cache client help
item.dc:creator: @aciraccar aciraccar
item.description:
@aciraccar wrote:

Higher Revision takes more CPU and i think u gotta dump npc files maybe cache doesnt contain it

Read full topic
